title: Beautiful 5 bedroom home in highly desirable Copperleaf Neighborhood!
posting_body: Beautiful 5 bedroom home in highly desirable Copperleaf Neighborhood!
Fully finished with open concept floorplan, large kitchen with island, ss appliances and large pantry.

Cozy up to the beautiful fireplace in the large family room that has built in surround sound and subwoofers- outlets in the wall that transmit amplified sound through the ceiling of the family room- great for family entertainment!
Upstairs includes primary bedroom with 5 piece bath, 3 bedrooms, laundry room and large loft.
Big beautifully finished basement has rec room, bedroom, bath and unfinished storage.
Home has new carpet on main and upstairs levels!
Outside you will find a large yard and a deck where you can sit and enjoy your mountain view.
Copperleaf includes pool, clubhouse and many parks and trails.
Great location near shopping/dining and freeway access.
Pets will be considered with deposit and pet rent
This home is move in ready!
